name: Walking Simulator 2018 - Camino del Norte edition
name_original: Walking Simulator 2018 - Camino del Norte edition
description:
This is a game I made for Ludum Dare 40 about walking the Camino de Santiago.

Click to move.

Tipps:

- Don't walk more than 45km per day.
- Avoid having more than 9 blisters.
- Be sure to complete the Camino in max 38 days.
